sentences.english: After cried so hard I am feeling worse about the headache.
sentences.chinese: 眼淚呼啦啦地出來，哭完之後頭痛得更加厲害了。

sentences.english: Shout, to live each day, give yourself a big smile.
sentences.chinese: 呼啦啦，要過好每一天，給自己一個大大的微笑。
